title: I Think I’ll Hide My True Ability to the Last Moment - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   School Life   Shounen
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Clever Protagonist   Evil Gods   Goddesses   Godly Powers   Gods   Hiding True Abilities   Knights   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Spear Wielder   Sword And Magic   Underestimated Protagonist
author: Nekoyasha   猫夜叉
description: In a world where one gains skills by making contracts with gods, Yuno was born as the third son of a famous knight family. However, he was born with too much power to control it and soon became known as incompetent. However, Yuno was satisfied with that. He knew that too much power would bring disaster. However, a chance encounter at the Magic Knight Academy leads to a fateful encounter with a nameless goddess who, like Yuno, is despised for her incompetence. This story is about a boy who makes a contract with a nameless goddess and tries his best to make her the supreme goddess.>
